backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister handling contact requests and user profiles with admin and user authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific hero text color change to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Assets configuration enabling publishing of the .well-known directory for domain verification.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style tokens defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: IC domain verification file listing the apex and www domains.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all major crawlers full access for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing all landing-page sections in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section describing the business, Quer√©taro context, and trust metrics with an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Simple Formspree-backed contact form with required fields and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact page section combining the contact form with business contact details and social links.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables with layout and utility rules.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth-scrolling helper that scrolls to an element by ID with header offset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors derived from CSS variables, animations, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and a pending request to change hero section text color to white.
